thread.section_title: Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Appreciation to the hotel concierges
thread.title_full: Appreciation to the hotel concierges - Review of Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: xuzeyue
title: Appreciation to the hotel concierges
text: What brought me over to this hotel was my company trip. And what keeps me coming back are those wonderful concierges! My exhaustion from traveling are always eliminated by their warm hospitality and positive attitude. Greatly recommended this place.
